## ClickableObject interface

THREE.Object3D with event handler added to act as a button

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ClickableObject extends THREE.Object3D 
```
**Extends:** THREE.Object3D

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onClick()](./verse-three-ui.clickableobject.onclick.md) | Click event handler. like [click](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/click_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onHover()](./verse-three-ui.clickableobject.onhover.md) | Cursor hover event handler. like [mouseover](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseover_event)<!-- -->. |
|  [onLeave()](./verse-three-ui.clickableobject.onleave.md) | Cursor leave event handler. like [mouseleave](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mouseleave_event)<!-- -->. |
